'The Republic of Singapore Air Force' (RSAF, ; ; ) is the air arm of the
Singapore Armed Forces. It was first established in 1968 as the Singapore Air
Defence Command (SADC). In 1975, it was renamed as the Republic of Singapore Air
Force.
